website_summaries.verdict: Made entirely of reflective material, this jacket is hard to miss in any light.
pros: Bright reflective material makes it easy to see even at dawn and dusk
For the price, you won't find better visibility

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea, but execution not up to par
customer_reviews.text: I followed the sizing chart and ended up with a jacket that was too big. Also, wasn't finding the zipper around the edge of the hood comfortable against my face. The fabric is fully reflective, so the jacket is great for being seen at night. The chest pocket doesn't open. Why bother to put it on the jacket then? The quality of workmanship was low; stitching is lumpy in places. I found a less expensive fully-reflective jacket with better fit and features, so I'm returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: West

customer_reviews.title: The reflection is AMAZING and the quality is awesome for the low price
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is everything I hoped it would be. I ordered one size up from my usual as per the sizing chart and it fits perfectly. It isn't fitted, but has a drawstring at the bottom. The zipper is sealed so wind won't blow through it. The reflection is AMAZING and the quality is awesome for the low price. Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Mishay Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I run and bike in the evening, and this jacket has been helpful for cars to see me in the dark! The jacket fits as expected and holds heat well. The zipper pocket is unfortunately fake, but the side pockets are deep enough for my phone and keys. Overall I'm very happy with this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected only because they run small and I ordered up a size. The zipper in the front is ornamental. Was disappointed not having that pocket. However, the jacket is warm because there is no ventilation. It cuts the wind and hardly feel the wind. I ran with this in a snow storm with 30 mph winds, a tech shirt, some head gear and felt great. People see me and move over. Company was responsive online also to email.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent visibility!
customer_reviews.text: I love this reflective fabric for running on dark mornings. I haven’t had any close calls with drivers since getting it. It is kind of a boxy fit and kind of hangs loosely at the waist/upper hip. I might take it in with the sewing machine. It launders well if you turn it inside out and wash with cold water and regular liquid detergent. The zipper chest pocket is odd - barely large enough for a key, but I don’t care. I bought this to be safely visible, and it is doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: seattle_seattle

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun. Looks normal in the day, freaks people out at night. Bonus, you can make every automatic faucet turn on from 10 feet away. Maybe not so good for the planet. Yeah, the toilets constantly flush too. Going to a public restroom in this jacket is...exciting. For everyone.
customer_reviews.author: MaxAzria

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be seen while jogging or bike riding, this jacket is the bomb! It does run small and only fit as expected because I read reviews regarding the item running small. I would normally purchase medium sized jackets, but got and XL and it fits just right. I took a star off because of the completely ornamental breast "pocket" zipper.
customer_reviews.author: missmanytoes

customer_reviews.title: order 2-3 sizes up
customer_reviews.text: The length of the sleeves aren't bad, but the torso is short. It's also tight at the bottom, not oversized like the picture. Material is interesting, and only ordered to ride my bike at night, nothing more. It will work for what I want. I am normally a L / XL, ordered a 2XL and wish it were even bigger. Asian sizing for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Eckert

customer_reviews.title: You are seen in this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Product does it’s job. Rain beads up an it I am, most definitely, visible and reflective. I ordered a size up to layer with a fleece for the dark & wet fall/winter/spring in the PNW. I never wanted to go for walks because it it always too wet and dark. I am very concerned about being visible to drivers..now I don’t have any excuse to sit on the couch!! I think even the bears will see me in this jacket!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I think the pictures speak for themselves! The jacket is made entirely of reflective material. No one will be able to say that didn't see me! I love it and can't wait to wear it night running. I think it runs large. I normally wear a medium but I ordered an Asian XL so it fit like a US L. However, I think it fits like a US XL, but I plan on wearing it over several layers to keep warm during winter runs, so I'm okay with it running big.
customer_reviews.author: MM717

customer_reviews.title: It's reflective, so it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: It runs very small. I am 5'7" 155 pounds and I got the large and it is very snug. There is a strange, useless zipper on the chest. It's functional as a zipper but there is not an opening or pocket. And you can zip the entire hood all the way over your face if you don't want to see. Honestly, it does get the job done being a reflective layer.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Just a couple things- you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Why the fake zip up breast pocket? I read reviews and thought all the pockets were fake , but it has two pockets without zippers , and a fake breast pocket. Just to be clear. -one other thing ... the pills to tighten the Bottem of the coat were not very good. They had to be tied because the cinch won’t hold them. Other then that it seem to be of good quality and highly reflective.
customer_reviews.author: ~*Shop*~

customer_reviews.title: great-looking safety/rain jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for my bicycle-riding teen daughter. She is slender and fit and about 5'5 tall. She loves the rain jacket because it looks like "a normal jacket" when not illuminated by light ( it is a grey color), and I love that it literally glows when light hits it, making her very visible even in fairly low light conditions riding her bike (but it glows white, not neon!). I went with the advice of others and ordered a size up from what I normally would (got her a medium) which allows her to wear a sweater underneath if she so chooses.
customer_reviews.author: dropsoftruth

customer_reviews.title: The chest pocket is fake.
customer_reviews.text: The pocket on the chest isn’ta real pocket, just a zipper and the pockets for your hands don’t have zipper so running in this requires a fanny pack but if you have pockets on your workout pants that works too so it may not be a big deal for some. Good quality, highly reflective, overall good buy. Would appreciate an actual zip pocket somewhere though. Fits as expected from reading the other reviews, it’s not fired I bought a small and still have room for a workout zip up underneath with enough room to move to be comfortable but not so much that it feels bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Kalireyna Caitlin Rose Streeby

customer_reviews.title: reflective jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Because I wear layers I was able to wear this jacket all winter. I just love this jacket and so I ordered another one. My sister loved it so much I also got one for her for her birthday. I just wiped my jacket off when it go soiled so I never washed it. My daughter had one and said when she washed hers it ruined it. She didn't get hers at the same place I purchased mine so I played it safe. I didn't see any care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie H

customer_reviews.title: Very reflective jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket for the price. The fit is true to size, not baggy, not too tight. I got this for bicycling. It is a windbreaker type jacket so you will get overheated in warm weather but will be perfect for Sping, Fall and a layer under for colder days. It is super reflective! You can see it even in your home if the room lighting hits it just right. Great product for the price, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: More like a US SM/MED
customer_reviews.text: Way too small and I ordered an XXL. More like a US SM/MED.
customer_reviews.author: Erika D

customer_reviews.title: awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: as long as you size up, the fit is excellent. for reference, i normally wear a size S in adult unisex T shirts and the M in this jacket is perfect for me. awesome alternative to the 10x more expensive nike version
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not American size
customer_reviews.text: The conversion from Asian size to American size does not work. The Jacket is WAY too small. Love it otherwise, just unable to close it... Newsflash!!!! Some women have boobs! I am keeping the jacket because of the great reflection, just wont be able to ever close it! Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Maike C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reflective jacket, great price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this jacket to wear when I walk or run in my neighborhood at night. I first bought a US L per the reviews saying it ran small (and I normally buy US M), but the large swallowed me. I returned for a US S/Asian M, and the fit is perfect. I am 5’2” and 135 lbs. The US Small is not too baggy, but still roomy enough that if I did want to wear a sweater underneath it, I could.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this....
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 and about 120 pounds and I got a large. I was reading the reviews and people said that the jacket runs a little small so you should size up one and that's what I did . I would normally get a medium, and I think a medium would've fit fine but I like my jackets a little roomy so this was a perfect fit. People were complaining about the fake pocket in the front but that doesn't bother me at all. The jacket is beautiful, it reflects so good i'm happy with this purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility- decent fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent jacket for the price. I chose 4 stars because the zipper is uncomfortable. It goes all the way up the hood, so it scratches when it's zipped high. There were also several scratches in the material when I got the jacket. It's still functional and they're hard to see, but it was frustrating to receive a scratched product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: Very reflective - cheap and bright
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter for cycling around campus. I feel a lot better when she's this visible. This is VERY reflective material, like the silver material on highway signs - looks very bright when headlights shine on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Elwood

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’10 and about 190lbs. My husband has this same exact jacket from a boutique and I fell in love and wanted one. To my surprise when I looked it up on amazon I was able to get my jacket for about 40 dollars cheaper than he paid for his and it’s the exact jacket! Great material and I’m so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Shay P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s entire jacket is reflective and it’s silver not yellow like service clerks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Made out of country but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’5 and 135 lbs, this fits well and it’s highly reflective as I wanted. For the price it isn’t a bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: It’s dark in the dark
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A FAKE. The product you get is grey and in the dark is dark grey when you shine a bright flashlight on it. DO NOT USE THIS AT NIGHT. It is not reflective and you will get run over by a truck if you are relying on his jacket to make you visible. VERY DISAPPOINTED in this expensive piece of cheap plastic. Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.author: wannabesailing

customer_reviews.title: Great, but u get kind of sweaty
customer_reviews.text: This material doesn't really let your skin breath. It's almost like a sauna jacket
customer_reviews.author: Liza Lingad

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for work.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this jacket. I use it for farm work under a hi-vis vest, and it doesn't only look awesome, it's windproof and waterproof as well. 10/10 would recommend! PS: It reflects differently with water on it, looks very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Not the most fashionable thing, but very very reflective, so I feel safer walking and cycling. Plus it's a good windbreaker. I like that if i fall off my bike, I'm still visible to cars.
customer_reviews.author: anonyme

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for less
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because the elastic on the left side broke in the first use, but otherwise this is a solid product. I looked at $90-180 Kia let’s that did the exact same thing so I’m incredibly happy. I continue to have people stop me to tell me I’m lit up like a light bulb!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The reflection is awesome. I listened to the asian sizing recommendations and bought a size bigger which was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lora Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It fit just right because I read reviews and sizing chart. It is just a wind breaker so if you plan to be using it in the winter I’d go 2 sizes up so you could fit a sweatshirt under it but I got one size up and it fits perfectly with a shirt or very thin sweater under! Very reflecting! It’s perfect for my early morning bike rides!
customer_reviews.author: Josh h.

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: I really love this jacket. I use it for working out at night
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! Works great for walking/running at night. A little warmer than I expected too, which was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Great fit. I'm going to order one for my hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Liudahl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a grandchild who loves it
customer_reviews.author: Rosita Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zipper
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is highly reflective, fits well and is waterproof. It was great for winter night riding (biking), but unfortunately the zipper stoped working after about two months of use. Now the zipper splits and doesn't stay shut at all. I would buy this jacket again if it weren't for the poor quality zipper.
customer_reviews.author: jillian zemanek

customer_reviews.title: Highly visible...yass
customer_reviews.text: I got a large. The main purpose was to be more visible when motorcyclingband walking the streets in the dark. It is not breathable but it reflects awesomely.
customer_reviews.author: Nomada

customer_reviews.title: The better to see you with...
customer_reviews.text: I love the total reflectivity of this jacket. Talk about visibility! It is well constructed and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Visibility
customer_reviews.text: I was totally amazed at the visibility this jacket provides! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stauffcaher

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase, Best amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase, Best amazon purchase, Best safety purchase, Best funny/strange design elements, Best comments on the street. This coat is the BOMB.
customer_reviews.author: Faith L Berry

customer_reviews.title: I feel much safer
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking in the road at night, I feel much safer
customer_reviews.author: ruth adams

customer_reviews.title: Made well and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! Not only does it reflect light when running or walking at night, but it also insulates the heat so you stay warm with a fleece or sweatshirt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Boorom

customer_reviews.title: I love the look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, but it's kind of cheaply made (the nylon zipper). Probably a feature of the reflective material in general but it isn't breathable, so I get a little sweaty wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: xsx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and VERY reflective
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a night out (fashion statement). However, this would be perfect for other uses at night. You can be seen a mile away (slight exaggeration).
customer_reviews.author: Melanin Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Great for running in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is perfect for my early morning runs in the dark. Keeps me warm, dry, and visible!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Shearman

customer_reviews.title: Jacket looks dope at night | Get a bigger size for prime!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mom, she gets off work in the night and she fears the bus might always drive past her because its so dark where she has to get the bus at... near woods and such. This will definitely catch the bus driver's eye. When I purchased this, only Large was available for prime so in the future hopefully a bigger size will be available because my mother cant zip up the jacket but the sleeves fit her arm perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tatted🖤🥀

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Light weight, reflective, stylish. I am 6’1, 155 lbs. I got an xl and it fit perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica coles

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Fit decently everywhere but the arms are very short. Would suggest sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: coat
customer_reviews.text: love it but its really hot. But I am in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: It IS very reflective - which was my goal - to be seen at night.
customer_reviews.text: Especially to wear at night and be seen and it totally works!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

product_meta.title: TR Women's Fully Reflective Jacket 3M Cycling Jacket
product_meta.description:
According to the customer's review, we updated our jacket size as US size.

XS Shoulder 46cm=18.11in, Bust 88cm=34.64in, Sleeve 55cm=21.65in, Length 63cm=24.80in,

S Shoulder 48cm=18.89in, Bust 92cm=36.22in, Sleeve 57cm=22.44in, Length 65cm=25.59in, 
M Shoulder 50cm=19.68in, Bust 96cm=37.79in, Sleeve 59cm=23.22in, Length 67cm=26.37in, 
L Shoulder 52cm=20.47in, Bust 100cm=39.37in, Sleeve 61cm=24.01in, Length 69cm=27.16in, 
XL Shoulder 54cm=21.25in, Bust104cm=40.94in, Sleeve 63cm=24.80in, Length 71cm=27.95in,
feature_bullets: We convert the Asian size to US size,so just choose your normal US size
The bottom has a drawstring so that it can be tightened up there
When it's windy and rainy, you can use it as a raincoat,water resistant
It's easy to be seen in the dark when you're out running and walking your dog at night
Super reflective shell material, suitable for low light at night, high visibility and all-weather conditions
